cancel_anytime.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel_anytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your dashboard. You'll retain access until the end of your paid period.

annual_discount.question: Is there a discount for annual subscriptions?
annual_discount.answer: Yes, we offer up to 20% discount on annual subscriptions compared to monthly billing.

upgrade_plan.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
upgrade_plan.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade your plan anytime and get additional features immediately.

data_security.question: Is my data secure and protected?
data_security.answer: Yes, we use the highest security standards and data encryption to protect your information and ensure privacy.
